channel.title: ETL on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in ETL on Datumorphism

item.title: Extract, Transform and Load
item.description: ETL Process ETL ETL Extract: extract data from sources Transform: transform it to proper format Load: load it to data storage infrastructure E for Extract Should not affect the source system. T for Transform Cleaning Filtering Enriching Splitting Joining L for Load Deal with sync and waiting
